name: Furry land - Free
description:
Furry land is a fun and addictive game for everyone. Match 3 cute furries to bring the unique board to life. Defeat the furry boss and rescue furry land to become the hero. Get free special moves by matching 4 or more. Collect different colors to win. Release the trapped furries. Collect enough points to get 3 strars. New quests everyday to earn the super duper moves. 177,147 level combinations.

Free version, NO pay to win. All features for free, NO accidental "in-app purchases".

Reviews:
AppHappy 94/100 http://www.apphappy.net/furryland/
